channel.title: Polish Language (and others...)
channel.description:
Hi there :slight_smile:
I have a question - how many languages would be avaiable in Black Mesa: Source? I mean, i don't need it but many fans in Poland (and other coutries) are so exicted about this mod, but they didn't know english so good.
So - will be there any translations? If no - can i help? I translated some games and i know the deal.
